Options HOME ONLINE STORE Baking Brittle Chocolate Bars Florida Themed Fudge Gift Boxes & Baskets Hot Chocolate Merchandise Popcorn Shells Snacking & Novelty Wine Sauces TASTING TOURS About Us STORE LOCATIONS CUSTOMER REVIEWS Toggle navigation www.whetstonechocolates.com My Account Log In Contact Us CHECKOUT 0 PROVIDING ST. AUGUSTINE WITH CHOCOLATE SINCE 1967 Previous Next BOOK CHOCOLATE TASTING TOUR DESSERT & WINE SAUCES A delicious finishing touch for ice cream, coffee, fresh fruit, or a rich chocolate dessert, our wine and liqueur sauces will always delight. take your dessert to the next level and be the envy of all your dinner guests. BUY NOW BOOK TOUR Our Chocolate Tasting Tour have been created especially for chocolate lovers. Let us take you on an adventure into Whetstone Chocolates inside knowledge and tasting tips. Over 45 minutes, you will learn the best ways to understand different types of chocolate, how it should be tasted and what to look out for. As you progress through the tour you will also discover how to pick out the flavors and texture influenced by such things as the type of cocoa used, and other secrets of the trade Truffle Assortment - 6 Pieces TRUFFLE ASSORTMENT 6 PIECES Our Price: Milk Chocolate Key lime Pie Shell Bag 7oz Made with milk chocolate and natural Key Lime flavor . Each is individually foil wrapped. 7 oz. Bag Dark Chocolate Menendez Shell Bag (72% Cocoa) 7oz Made with De Leon Dark Chocolate 72% Cocoa. Each is individually foil wrapped in red. Milk Chocolate Toffee Crunch Shell Bag 7oz Made with milk chocolate and small pieces of almond toffee crunch. Each is individually foil wrapped. Milk Chocolate Valencia Orange Shell Bag 7oz Keep up to date with Whetstone Discounts:: Connect With Us Facebook Twitter Blogger About Our Store It all started with a great idea and a little hard work. Today we're proud to provide quality products direct to your doorstep through an experience you'll enjoy. And most of all, we hope you'll enjoy the products as much as we do. thought: The WHOIS information shows that the domain has been registered since 1995, which is a good sign as it indicates a long-standing presence on the internet. The registrant and admin details seem to be consistent and associated with a legitimate business, Edgewater Inn, which suggests that the site is not fraudulent. The presence of a physical address and phone number in the registrant information is also a positive sign. There is no immediate evidence of non-existent companies, inappropriate contact information, or other red flags from the WHOIS data. However, to complete the analysis, I should check for customer reviews or any public complaints about the website.
